trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_SEQ_00<tab>Vuyargur has a task for you that he cannot delegate.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the Chirwagur payment to the charitable Chirwagur in Solace.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Chirwagur salt to Vuyargur.

TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_000<tab>Salt is vital to our operations—both to grit icy paths and preserve food—and it is high time that we replenished our stocks. Unfortunately, we have encountered a minor issue...
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_001<tab>Our Chirwagur supplier has requested you by name. Would you be willing to complete the trade in our stead?

TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_002<tab>My thanks. You should find him to the northwest of Worlar's Echo. All you need do is hand over this talisman in exchange for the salt. And...stay on your guard.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_010<tab>It is you—good. I waited. We trade salt for talisman.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_011<tab>Talisman will be buried in saltern. Even greater divine blessing.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_012<tab>Do you...remember me? I was with Vorporlor. Traded crystal with Nopli. Now, we meet again.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_013<tab>You go to snow mountain with Yok Huy. Why?
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_015<tab>You are strange. <chuckle> Always involve self. Always interesting stories.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_016<tab>My kin will not meet outsiders. But you are interesting. To you, I will trade the divine blessing.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_YOKHUYENEMYA_000_017<tab>Here. Salt. Let us trade again. The divine blessing for your stories.
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_020<tab>Ah, you are returned! Did the trade go as planned?
TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_021<tab>My thanks. Chirwagur salt is the finest around, but they bear us a great deal of hostility. Negotiations are often a fraught affair...

TEXT_BANYOK116_05351_VUYARGUR_000_022<tab>Though it seems they have placed their trust in you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope I can count on your diplomatic dealings should they request your presence again!
